captions.text: *Murmuring outside*
Hey! Hey! Sorry we're late!
Oh, it's fine.
This is Ben...
So nice to finally meet you!
Pleasure to meet you.
Alright well I have to go to the restroom but then we can order.
Ok! I love you! I love you!
Well, here you are. Meeting your girlfriend's best friend for the first time. No big deal, right?
Then why are you sweating? You've never met this person before, and yet they already know everything about you.
Everything... This person knows about every fight you and your girlfriend ever had. She knows that you cried at the end of Toy Story 3.
She knows about that weird sex-thing you ask your girlfriend to do to you sometimes.
She also knows the way you pick at your nails when your nervous, drives your girlfriend up the wall.
You don't even know that. She knows how you stack up against all her ex-boyfriends.
She knows about ex-boyfriends you'll never know about. And what do you know about her?
Only what your girlfriend's told you. But you can't just lead off with, "So, I heard you have terrible taste in men?"
So, what do you talk about? What do you have in common? You need her approval.
Odds are her friendship will outlive your relationship. Odds are they've already discussed every end-game scenario.
Odds are she's already made up her mind about you.
So how can you impress her? How can you show her how much you care about her best friend?
Two waters.
Three!... Three waters.
Well that sure wasn't it. Whatever you do, do not flirt with her.
Or do anything that might be construed as flirting in court of law.
That's a nice shirt she's wearing. Wait! is this a test? If you look, will she tell on you?
Well this is going terribly, just start talking.
*Talking together*
Salvage yourself, genius. Find some common ground, anything.
I bet we've both seen Lisa's boobs.
What??
You are a moron.
Well sorry about that. So, what were you two talking about?
Your boobs.
And how we've both seen them.
Well they are pretty fantastic.
HahahahaThey are. I'm... I'm nervous.
I know, like definitely. You couldn't fool anybody.
I wasn't trying.
It's fine!
*Guy makes puke noises*

comments.text:

month... (We live in separate provinces so we don't get to see each other 
too often.)﻿

comments.text:
If your boyfriend's best friend is a girl then you've got something to 
worry about. Because a lot of times it's hard for the female best friend to 
accept the fact that you are his new best friend. And we all know how 
jealous girls can get. So not only will she be jealous of you, but you will 
be jealous of her because she and him grew up together and probably know a 
bunch of things that you don't. And there comes that one painful word 
that's impossible to get rid of... "History". -_-﻿
comments.author: Sunny Blue

comments.text:

worth it, since she'll poison her against you.﻿

comments.text:
I had to meet my girlfriends 6 best friends and get their approvals....... 
i won all of them over but one......we were at each others throats. We 
threw insults at one another and tried to steal my girlfriend away from one 
another.

Then i calmed down and was like wow she is right, i am being a terrible 
boyfriend and person right now, i looked at myself and improved. I asked 
for her apology and it was a tense one but she granted it, now i get a long 
with all of er friends and they all love us being together. 

Your girlfriends best friend is your best friend, they can see things you 
need to improve on before your partner because your partner is blinded by 
love. So seek their advice and take into account their criticism.﻿
